column2: TypeMigrationStatementProcessor should process non array PsiNewExpression the same way it processes PsiMethodCallExpression

column3: When triggering TypeMigration on int i = 0 to migrate int to long, it ends up with the following result:
new Foo(i); does not compile anymore.
This PR fixes it by processing non  array PsiNewExpression the same way as PsiMethodCallExpression.
